__e: He was making a big fuss because they were dirty and had to work.
You just said he hates dirty lawyers, and now you're saying he'll break the law?
Don't you think I could meet somebody wearing crappy shoes, and they'd still like me?
It was so dark and they were so dirty, it was difficult to tell.
Yeah, like when you think everybody's a bunch of dirt bags who are trying to pull fast ones.
And who says they are dirtier than others?
'Cause if anybody knows your dad's dirty little secrets, it's you.
I didn't know what to do with them.
I didn't see him that night until early in the morning and he had blood on his pants and shoes.
